title: 2012: Finding THE ONE - Harvested Thoughts
description: This is the first edition of what is now "DESTINY UNFULFILLED." Contact me for discounted new edition.Time is running out! You have never had life and existence described in such a way before! This author has a message for humankind, and YOU won't believe how it is told.The author, Seight Byproxy (S8-BP), is the messenger for the creator; a modern-day prophet, if you will. The words on these pages describe how a person may cross the threshold of dimensions in order to save our existence. There is only a seven percent chance that this person among us even exists, however. The need for this manuscript to reach THE ONE is of paramount importance.Even if you already have beliefs regarding our existence, how we were created, or how the universe was created, you will be fascinated by this manuscript. Otherwise, my publisher would not have taken the time to edit and publish it.You, on the other hand, have nothing more at stake than a quick click over to the preview webpage. You will quickly see that this is definitely a read that is worth it!I am searching for THE ONE.If you have the following traits, youmay be THE - You experience frequent "energies", or "vibrations"- You sense that someone, or something, is attempting to contact you somehow- You witness or experience "tricks of time", deja vu, very realistic dreams, or any type of telekinesis or transcendenceIf someone you know keeps talking about things like these, it is IMPORTANT that they have a chance to read "2012 - Finding THE ONE - Harvested Thoughts".The future of humankind depends upon the actions of THE ONE, assuming existence.Are you THE ONE?
author: Seight Byproxy
